description.p: First official Flatpak release bundled with the very latest stable releases of FFmpeg, mpv, MediaInfo and supporting codecs. The latest version introduces chapter support, black detect filter processing for scene detection and/or commercial skipping. Produced media files are now passed through a finalizing process as a new last step to help ensure sane results. Plus hundreds of bug fixes, optimisations and improvements over previous incarnations.
